icon_css_class()

[Source]

    # File app/models/attachment.rb, line 17
17:   def icon_css_class
18:     case content_type
19:     when "application/x-flash-video"
20:       then "video"
21:     when "video/x-flv"
22:       then "video"
23:     when "video/mp4"
24:       then "video"
25:     when "video/mpeg"
26:       then "video"
27:     when "video/quicktime"
28:       then "video"
29:     when "video/x-msvideo"
30:       then "video"
31:     when "application/zip"
32:       then "archive"
33:     when "application/x-rar"
34:       then "archive"
35:     when "audio/mpeg"
36:       then "audio"
37:     when "audio/mp4"
38:       then "audio"
39:     when "application/x-shockwave-flash"
40:       then "flash"
41:     when "image/gif"
42:       then "image"
43:     when "image/jpeg"
44:       then "image"
45:     when "image/png"
46:       then "image"
47:     when "image/tiff"
48:       then "image"
49:     when "image/x-psd"
50:       then "psd"
51:     when "text/plain"
52:       then "text"
53:     when "application/rtf"
54:       then "rtf"
55:     when "application/pdf"
56:       then "pdf"
57:     when "application/msword"
58:       then "word"
59:     when "application/vnd.ms-excel"
60:       then "excel"
61:     else
62:       "file"
63:     end
64:   end

[Validate]
